T02D2908:305a-1: badzra bi d'a ra na n'a ma sn'a ta bi dhi bri tti /
T02D2908:305a-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i khrus kyi cho ga'i 'grel pa //
T02D2908:305a-4: dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag //
T02D2908:305a-6: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dag dang rgyal po'i blon po dang /
T02D2908:305a-7: rje'u rigs dag dang dmangs rigs dag dang /
T02D2908:305a-8: dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ma brgal ba dag la /
T02D2908:305a-10: byad la sogs pa gzhan gyi /
T02D2908:305a-11: gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag la /
T02D2908:305a-12: dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho gas grol bar 'gyur te /
T02D2908:305a-13: de'i phyir de dag rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2908:305a-14: mdo sde 'di'i don gyi mtshan rdo rje rnam par
T02D2908:305a-15: 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi sgo nas nges
T02D2908:305a-16: par bstan te / ji ltar zhe na /
T02D2908:305a-17: rdo rje zhes pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dags te /
T02D2908:305a-18: ye shes de ni bsod nams dang ye shes tshad med pa rnams kyi tshogs can /
T02D2908:305a-19: rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas /
T02D2908:305a-20: de'i phyir lag na rdo rje lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis rlabs nas zhes bya bas /
T02D2908:305a-21: 'byung ba chen po bzhi las grub pa lta bu
T02D2908:305a-22: ni ma yin gyi ye shes kyi lus can du
T02D2908:305a-23: bstan pa'o // de'i phyir rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2908:305a-24: la snyoms par zhugs pa zhes pa yang ye shes
T02D2908:305a-25: des chos kyi de kho na nyid shin tu rtogs
T02D2908:305a-26: pa'i ngo bo rdo rje ltar thogs pa med pas
T02D2908:305a-27: rtse gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs la
T02D2908:305a-29: ci'i phyir ye shes 'di las rdo rje bya zhe na /
T02D2908:305a-30: phyi rol gyi rdo rje rin po che dang chos
T02D2908:305a-31: mthun pa rnam pa bdun yod pa'i phyir dpe'i sgo
T02D2908:305a-32: nas nye bar mtshon pa yin te //
T02D2908:305b-4: thams cad du thogs pa med pa /
T02D2908:305b-5: thams cad du ma pham pa zhes bya ba rnams te /
T02D2908:305b-6: de ni ye shes de nyid kyis rang gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang bstan to //
T02D2908:305b-7: de gzhan gyi don bstan pa ni //
T02D2908:305b-8: thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sna tshogs nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste /
T02D2908:305b-9: khams gsum pa 'jigs tshogs la lta ba /
T02D2908:305b-10: phyin ci log gi lta ba can /
T02D2908:305b-11: phyi dang nang nas bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par ldang ba'i rgyu //
T02D2908:305b-12: las kyi bag la nyal ba dang /
T02D2908:305b-13: kun nas ldang ba dang bcas pa de dag 'dul
T02D2908:305b-14: bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad du skrag
T02D2908:305b-16: sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2908:305b-17: sems can thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2908:305b-18: sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa /
T02D2908:305b-19: rmugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du cho ga'i don rnam pa bco lngas bstan te /
T02D2908:305b-20: de dag rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pa bstan te /
T02D2908:305b-21: zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod dang //
T02D2908:305b-22: dbang sogs las rnam bzhi bo dag //
T02D2908:305b-23: thabs kyis 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa //
T02D2908:305b-24: ci rigs par ni sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2908:305b-25: de ltar de dag gi ye shes kyi rdo rje des 'dul bar mdzad //
T02D2908:305b-26: sel bar mdzad 'joms par mdzad ba'i phyir //
T02D2908:305b-27: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2908:305b-28: de nas gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag gsungs pa
T02D2908:305b-29: de dag kyang ye shes kyi rgyu las byung ba'i
T02D2908:305b-30: phyir // thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i tshig tu rig par bya'o //
T02D2908:305b-31: de nas de dag gi cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2908:305b-32: cho gar bya ba thams cad la //
T02D2908:305b-33: gtsor slob dpon la rten par bya ba yin pas
T02D2908:305b-34: de'i phyir slon dpon slob ma gnyis sta gon la
T02D2908:305b-35: gnas pa'i cho ga bshad cing bstan par bya ba
T02D2908:305b-36: ni // des ni rab khrus gtsang ma yin //
T02D2908:305b-37: mdo sde dam par mnyan par bya //
T02D2908:305b-38: gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing //
T02D2908:305b-39: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2908:305b-40: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2908:305b-42: shin tu khrus bya ba dang /
T02D2908:305b-43: gos gtsang ma bgo ba ni phyi'i gtsang sbra'o //
T02D2908:305b-44: sgo gsum nas sdig pa mi byed pa ni yid dge ba'o //
T02D2908:305b-45: byang chub tu smon pa ni sems dang ba ste /
T02D2908:305b-46: de dag ni phyi nang gi gtsang sbra'o //
T02D2908:305b-47: mdo sde dam pa mnyam par bya //
T02D2908:306a-0: @306a * // rig sngags de rnams ye shes las byung bar rig par bya'o //
T02D2908:306a-1: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2908:306a-2: zhes pa yang ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rtogs pa nyid do //
T02D2908:306a-3: de nas slob dpon gyi cho gar bya ba ni
T02D2908:306a-4: mdo sde 'di nyid las dbang bskur ba'i bum pa
T02D2908:306a-5: yan lag bstan pa tsam du zad de /
T02D2908:306a-6: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa de
T02D2908:306a-7: nyid gsungs pa las mi mngon par 'gyur ba'am yang
T02D2908:306a-8: na spyi rgyud dag las gsal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2908:306a-9: de dag du ma bstan pa de gnyis ka ltar na yang de dag dang sbyar ba nyid do //
T02D2908:306a-11: phyugs lhas shing gcig lha yi khang pa dang //
T02D2908:306a-12: lam gyi bzhi mdo khang stong nags tshal du //
T02D2908:306a-13: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i tshad //
T02D2908:306a-14: tshon rtsi rnams sna tshogs kyis bri //
T02D2908:306a-15: phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su bsrung //
T02D2908:306a-16: sgro bzhi'i sa la ku sha'i rtsva rnams dgram //
T02D2908:306a-17: zhes gsungs pa la rig par bya'o //
T02D2908:306a-18: de ltar dkyil 'khor bya ba yang slob dpon gyis
T02D2908:306a-19: sa dang po brtag pa dang sbyor ba la sogs
T02D2908:306a-20: pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin du bya ste /
T02D2908:306a-21: 'thas par bcag ste ba'i rnam par lnga dang spos
T02D2908:306a-22: chu gtsang mas byugs te steng yang bla re bre
T02D2908:306a-23: zhing / dar gyi lnga ldi dang /
T02D2908:306a-24: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2908:306a-25: me long dag gis kyang brgyan par bya'o //
T02D2908:306a-26: gzhan yang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga la bkra shis
T02D2908:306a-27: kyi bum pa tshul dang mthun pa'i yon tan 'grub
T02D2908:306a-28: pa'i phyir 'di nyid las de'i rgyu bstan pa ni
T02D2908:306a-30: dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung //
T02D2908:306a-32: de'i nang du dgang pa ni chu yis zhes pa smos te /
T02D2908:306a-33: tsandan dang gur gsum la sogs pa'i spos chus bkang ste /
T02D2908:306a-34: de'i lhan cig ldan pa'i rin po che ni shes
T02D2908:306a-35: dang rdo rje zhes pa ni dngos su zad nor
T02D2908:306a-36: bu zhes bya ba spyi'i tshig tu smos te /
T02D2908:306a-37: rnam par ma phye ba'i padma r'a ga dang /
T02D2908:306a-38: aindra n'i la la sogs pa ni rin po che'i
T02D2908:306a-39: rigs su gtogs pa dang mu tig dang sel sbram
T02D2908:306a-41: de dag gas chag med pa rgyan gyi bya ba
T02D2908:306a-42: byed nus pa ste rin chen rma med ces bya'o
T02D2908:306a-43: // gzhan yang de'i zla la yungs kar dang /
T02D2908:306a-45: me tog rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2908:306a-46: tshul de bzhin du spyi rgyud las kyang /
T02D2908:306a-47: bum pa padma dmar po'i mdog 'dra zhing //
T02D2908:306a-48: nag por ri med cing rin chen bcas //
T02D2908:306b-0: @306b sman dang 'bru dang spos chus bkang ba dag //
T02D2908:306b-1: kha rgyan ras kyis mgul pa dkri par bya //
T02D2908:306b-3: de dag gi lto bar chu bre gang shong pa la sogs pa bstan to //
T02D2908:306b-4: mtshan nyid gzhan rgyud dag las rig par bya'o //
T02D2908:306b-5: yang gong ma'i 'bru dang sman zhes bya ba la /
T02D2908:306b-6: bya kri seng kri la sogs pa'i sman rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2908:306b-7: til dang sran ma sha ka la sogs pa'i 'bru sna tshogs rnams rgyud las grangs pa bzhin no //
T02D2908:306b-8: mgul chings gtsang ma'i gos zhes bya ba ma spyad
T02D2908:306b-9: pa ma nyams pa'i ras dkar po kha tshar dang
T02D2908:306b-10: bcas pa'o // dkri zhing dang ba ni gong du
T02D2908:306b-11: bstan pa'i rdzas rnams kyi mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o
T02D2908:306b-12: bcas pa'o // // bum pa de ltar byas pa
T02D2908:306b-13: yang rtog pa gzhan cho ga las 'byung ba ji
T02D2908:306b-14: bzhin du grangs bzhi 'am lnga'am ma gu gul gyi
T02D2908:306b-15: dung pa la sogs pas bdug la dbus dang grva
T02D2908:306b-16: bcas pa'o // // bzhir gzhag pa'o // de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyi khro bor bsgyur nas /
T02D2908:306b-17: lag pas rdo rje dang yungs kar blangs te /
T02D2908:306b-19: mtshams bcad pa dag byas nas /
T02D2908:306b-20: thig skud lag tu blangs te /
T02D2908:306b-21: phyogs ma 'khrul bar sa bcad de /
T02D2908:306b-22: rim pa gsum par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2908:306b-23: de nas ri mo bri ste /
T02D2908:306b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya rdo rje rgya
T02D2908:306b-25: gram las phyogs gcig med pa padma 'am seng ge'i
T02D2908:306b-27: de'i grva bzhir 'khor rnams kyi phyag mtshan byang shar mtshams nas brtsams te /
T02D2908:306b-28: khro bo rdo rje gdengs pa dang /
T02D2908:306b-29: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T02D2908:306b-30: be con rdo rjes mtshan pa dang /
T02D2908:306b-31: rdo rje tho ba rnams bri'o //
T02D2908:306b-32: de nas rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs pa phyogs skyong bcu dang /
T02D2908:306b-33: de'i bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad kyi phyag mtshan yang bri'o //
T02D2908:306b-34: rim pa gsum par ni rin po che'i chun 'phyang
T02D2908:306b-35: dang mu tig gi phreng ba dag dgod cing phyogs
T02D2908:306b-36: bzhir sgo khyud dang rta babs kyis mdzes par bya'o
T02D2908:306b-37: // de'i phyir rol stegs bu'i mtha' skor du rtsva ku shas bskor cing /
T02D2908:306b-38: me tog gi sil ma dag kyang dgram mo //
T02D2908:306b-39: de nas phyi rol du byung ste /
T02D2908:306b-40: 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir //
T02D2908:306b-41: bza' ba sha chang la phug la sogs bcas //
T02D2908:306b-42: 'bras chan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin //
T02D2908:306b-43: zhes bya ba dag khyer nas /
T02D2908:306b-44: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02D2908:307a-1: la sogs pa'i bstod pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2908:307a-2: bden pa bdar bar byas nas lag pa gnyis kyis
T02D2908:307a-3: thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las kha phye
T02D2908:307a-4: ste / bkan nas bstan pa'i tshul du bya ba ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2908:307a-5: 'byung bo de dag la so so'i rig sngags dag
T02D2908:307a-6: brjod cing nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig pas byin gyis
T02D2908:307a-7: brlabs te bsngo'o // de nas slar yang log ste
T02D2908:307a-8: lha'i gnas su song la tshon gyi dkyil 'khor de
T02D2908:307a-9: dag mdun gyi bar snang la gyen du spag cing
T02D2908:307a-10: rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gdan seng ge dang
T02D2908:307a-11: padmar bcas pa'i gdan khri bsams nas der rig sngags
T02D2908:307a-12: kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ba ni
T02D2908:307a-13: pho brang lcang lo can gyi dpal phyag na rdo
T02D2908:307a-14: rje ye shes kyi snang ba'i khyad par las byung
T02D2908:307a-15: brlabs te bsngo'o // ba'i / dpal rdo rje rnam
T02D2908:307a-16: par 'joms pa zhes bya ba sku mdog ljang sngon
T02D2908:307a-17: zhal gyi smin ma khro gnyer can phyag g-yas rdo
T02D2908:307a-18: rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D2908:307a-19: phyag g-yon pa dkur brten cing 'gying bag can /
T02D2908:307a-20: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dar ljang gu'i tshig gu gsol ba /
T02D2908:307a-21: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'khor lo rig sngags kyi lha dang /
T02D2908:307a-22: khro bo phyag brnyan grangs med pa'i tshogs can bdag nyid kyi phyag rgyas spyan drang ste /
T02D2908:307a-23: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la
T02D2908:307a-24: srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la phan tshun bsnol
T02D2908:307a-25: ba'i rtse mo mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad bkug
T02D2908:307a-26: par byas la / gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug la /
T02D2908:307a-27: bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas nas
T02D2908:307a-28: mthe bong gnyis mthe'u chung gnyis gzhibs la de'i sngags
T02D2908:307a-29: ni / aom badzra dzva la n'a ya sv'a h'am /
T02D2908:307a-31: yang na rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo //
T02D2908:307a-32: de nas thog mar dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya bstan par bya ste /
T02D2908:307a-33: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bos mnan la /
T02D2908:307a-34: lhag ma rnams rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul du byas te /
T02D2908:307a-35: de'i sngags ni aom sham ka re ma h'a sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2908:307a-37: de nas yang dkyil 'khor nang gi grva bzhir khro bo bzhi gzhag ste /
T02D2908:307a-38: byang shar mtshams nas bzung ste khro bo'i rgyal po
T02D2908:307a-39: rdo rje gtum po zhes bya ba sku mdog smug
T02D2908:307a-40: nas / bzhin khro gnyer can phyag g-yas na rdo
T02D2908:307b-0: rje rtse lnga gdengs @307b par byas pa thogs par
T02D2908:307b-1: nas / bsams te / de'i phyag rgya ni lag
T02D2908:307b-2: pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mo snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag
T02D2908:307b-3: / g-yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje ltar bya
T02D2908:307b-4: nas / bsams te / ste / de nyid kyi sngags kyang 'di nyid las /
T02D2908:307b-5: tstshinda tstshinda ma h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2908:307b-7: de nas shar lho mtshams su rdo rje k'i l'a ya zhes bya ba /
T02D2908:307b-8: mdog ljang nag dpral ba khro gnyer can phyag g-yas
T02D2908:307b-9: pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa ka na ya'i dbyibs
T02D2908:307b-10: 'dra ba thogs par bsams te de'i phyag rgya ni
T02D2908:307b-11: lag pa gnyis khu tshur nang du bcangs te /
T02D2908:307b-12: cung zad bsnol ba'i tshul du bcug ste mthe bong gnyis gyen du gzhibs te bsgreng la /
T02D2908:307b-14: bandha bandha kro dha kro dha k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2908:307b-15: de nas yang lho nub mtshams su rdo rje be
T02D2908:307b-16: con zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing nag sma ra
T02D2908:307b-18: g-yas na be con gyi rtse mo rdo rjes mtshan
T02D2908:307b-19: pa bsams te de'i phyag rgya ni phyag 'tshal ba
T02D2908:307b-20: thal mo sbyar ba las mthe bong gnyis bsgreng te
T02D2908:307b-21: / tshigs bkug nas srin lag gi drung du gzugs par bya'o //
T02D2908:307b-22: de'i sngags ni tsu ru tsu ru tsanda k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a h'a zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2908:307b-23: de nas nub byang mtshams su rdo rje khro bo
T02D2908:307b-24: zhes bya ba mdog nag po zhin tu khros pa
T02D2908:307b-25: mche ba gtsigs pa bsams te /
T02D2908:307b-26: de'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs
T02D2908:307b-27: te mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste mthe'u chung gnyis nang
T02D2908:307b-28: du gzhug go // de'i sngags ni hr'a sa ya
T02D2908:307b-29: tr'a sa ya badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya sv'a
T02D2908:307b-30: h'a zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2908:307b-31: de nas de'i phyir rol gyi dkyil 'khor rim pa
T02D2908:307b-32: gsum par dbang ldan la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong
T02D2908:307b-33: ba bcu dang / rnam rgyal la sogs pa bkra
T02D2908:307b-34: shis kyi lha brgyad kyi phyag mtshan rnams dgod par
T02D2908:307b-35: ba bcu dang / bya ba'i phyir / de dag
T02D2908:307b-36: so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcings la spyan drangs
T02D2908:307b-37: shing rang rang gnas su bkod nas gtso bo 'khor
T02D2908:307b-38: dang bcas pa rnams la gus pa khyad par can
T02D2908:307b-39: ba bcu dang / bya ba'i phyir / byas te
T02D2908:307b-40: / mchod yon dang me tog dang bdug spos la
T02D2908:307b-41: sogs pa dang zhal zas dang mar me'i mchog rnams
T02D2908:307b-43: de nas phyags bcu dag na ji ltar srid pa'i lha rdzas dang /
T02D2908:307b-44: kun du bzang po'i mchod dag gis kyang mchod la /
T02D2908:307b-45: nam mkha' mdzod kyi rig pas kyang byin gyis brlab ste /
T02D2908:307b-46: 'di ltar nam: sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02D2908:308a-0: bi shva mu khe bhya: sarbba tad kham @308a * //
T02D2908:308a-1: aungga spha ra na hi mam ga ga na kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2908:308a-2: de nas bstod pa gang yang rung bas bstod //
T02D2908:308a-3: de nas rig sngags gdon pa ni /
T02D2908:308a-4: lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam //
T02D2908:308a-5: yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2908:308a-6: ces bya bas grangs nges par gsungs pa la /
T02D2908:308a-7: rtsa ba'i rig sngags dang mjug nas yang snying gi
T02D2908:308a-8: sngags rnams dang gnyis bskul ba dang bcas par zlo
T02D2908:308a-9: na ni lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig zlos par
T02D2908:308a-10: 'gyur ro // yang na de rnam pa gnyis ka
T02D2908:308a-11: zlos par mi nus na nam: tsanda badzra zhes pa
T02D2908:308a-12: nas aa mri te h'um phat ces pa'i bar ni
T02D2908:308a-13: rig sngags 'di'i yang snying ste bskul tshig dang bcas
T02D2908:308a-14: pa lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2908:308a-15: de ltar bzlas brjod zin nas yon bdag dang slob
T02D2908:308a-16: ma gnyis ka yang dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro
T02D2908:308a-17: bar bya'o // dkyil 'khor dbus su khri lta bu
T02D2908:308a-18: gzhag pa'i sar yang na ri mo yid kyis gdeg
T02D2908:308a-19: bar bya'o // pa dang / yang na phyag rgya nyi tshe bya'o //
T02D2908:308a-20: de nas der bum pa rnams kyi chus blugs shing dbang bskur te /
T02D2908:308a-21: shu ti dang nye shing la sogs pas kyang bkru /
T02D2908:308a-22: rol mo dang bkra shis la sogs pa yang gdon no //
T02D2908:308a-23: khrus zin nas sgor 'byung ba'i dus su zho dang
T02D2908:308a-24: mar dang sman dang 'bras bu la sogs pa bkra
T02D2908:308a-25: shis kyi rdzas rnams la cho gar bstan pa rnams
T02D2908:308a-26: mthong ba dang reg pa dag ni bkag pa med
T02D2908:308a-27: do // de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i
T02D2908:308a-28: cho ga'i phan yon 'byung ba mdor bsdus na gnyis
T02D2908:308a-29: do // su 'dus te / sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa dang bde ba skyed par byed pa'o //
T02D2908:308a-30: de la sdug bsngal sel ba ni /
T02D2908:308a-31: sems can dbang po nyams pa dang //
T02D2908:308a-32: tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang //
T02D2908:308a-34: de dag thams cad zhi bar blta //
T02D2908:308a-36: sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas //
T02D2908:308a-37: sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed //
T02D2908:308a-38: ces bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa bzhis bstan to //
T02D2908:308a-39: bde ba skyed par byed pa ni /
T02D2908:308a-40: rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba / dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan //
T02D2908:308a-43: sdig pa kun las rnam par thar //
T02D2908:308a-44: zhes bya ba rnams kyis bstan te /
T02D2908:308a-45: de dag gis phan yon mdor bsdus pa tsam du zad kyi /
T02D2908:308a-46: gzhan yang rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2908:308b-2: dug dang mtshon la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol bar rig par bya'o /
T02D2908:308b-4: // / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho
T02D2908:308b-5: ga'i 'grel pa slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad
